00056 void ValidateEnemiesHaveWeapons()
00057 {
00058       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00059             SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, 0, 639, 479 };
00060             INT32 i, iErrorDialog;
00061             SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00062             INT32 iNumInvalid = 0;
00063 
00064             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00065             {
00066                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
00067                   if( !pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector )
00068                   {
00069                         continue;
00070                   }
00071                   if( !pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem )
00072                   {
00073                         iNumInvalid++;
00074                   }
00075             }
00076 
00077             // do message box and return
00078             if( iNumInvalid )
00079             {
00080                   UINT16 str[ 100 ];
00081                   swprintf( str, L"%d enemies have been added without any weapons!  KM:0.  Please note sector.", iNumInvalid );
00082                   iErrorDialog = DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, str, GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, &CenteringRect );
00083             }
00084       #endif
00085 }

00087 //Counts enemies and crepitus, but not bloodcats.
00088 UINT8 NumHostilesInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
00089 {
00090       UINT8 ubNumHostiles = 0;
00091 
00092       Assert( sSectorX >= 1 && sSectorX <= 16 );
00093       Assert( sSectorY >= 1 && sSectorY <= 16 );
00094       Assert( sSectorZ >= 0 && sSectorZ <= 3 );
00095 
00096       if( sSectorZ )
00097       {
00098             UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector;
00099             pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, (UINT8)sSectorZ );
00100             if( pSector )
00101             {
00102                   ubNumHostiles = (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites + pSector->ubNumCreatures);
00103             }
00104       }
00105       else
00106       {
00107             SECTORINFO *pSector;
00108             GROUP *pGroup;
00109 
00110             //Count stationary hostiles
00111             pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ];
00112             ubNumHostiles = (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites + pSector->ubNumCreatures);
00113             
00114             //Count mobile enemies
00115             pGroup = gpGroupList;
00116             while( pGroup )
00117             {
00118                   if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == sSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == sSectorY )
00119                   {
00120                         ubNumHostiles += pGroup->ubGroupSize;
00121                   }
00122                   pGroup = pGroup->next;
00123             }
00124       }
00125 
00126       return ubNumHostiles;
00127 }

00194 UINT8 NumStationaryEnemiesInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
00195 {
00196       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00197       Assert( sSectorX >= 1 && sSectorX <= 16 );
00198       Assert( sSectorY >= 1 && sSectorY <= 16 );
00199       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ];
00200 
00201       if( pSector->ubGarrisonID == NO_GARRISON )
00202       { //If no garrison, no stationary.
00203             return( 0 );
00204       }
00205       
00206       // don't count roadblocks as stationary garrison, we want to see how many enemies are in them, not question marks
00207       if ( gGarrisonGroup[ pSector->ubGarrisonID ].ubComposition == ROADBLOCK )
00208       {
00209             // pretend they're not stationary
00210             return( 0 );
00211       }
00212 
00213       return (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites);
00214 }

00216 UINT8 NumMobileEnemiesInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
00217 {
00218       GROUP *pGroup;
00219       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00220       UINT8 ubNumTroops;
00221       Assert( sSectorX >= 1 && sSectorX <= 16 );
00222       Assert( sSectorY >= 1 && sSectorY <= 16 );
00223 
00224       ubNumTroops = 0;
00225       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00226       while( pGroup )
00227       {
00228             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == sSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == sSectorY )
00229             {
00230                   ubNumTroops += pGroup->ubGroupSize;
00231             }
00232             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00233       }
00234 
00235       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ];
00236       if( pSector->ubGarrisonID == ROADBLOCK )
00237       { //consider these troops as mobile troops even though they are in a garrison
00238             ubNumTroops += (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites);
00239       }
00240 
00241       return ubNumTroops;
00242 }
00243 
00244 void GetNumberOfMobileEnemiesInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 *pubNumAdmins, UINT8 *pubNumTroops, UINT8 *pubNumElites )
00245 {
00246       GROUP *pGroup;
00247       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00248       Assert( sSectorX >= 1 && sSectorX <= 16 );
00249       Assert( sSectorY >= 1 && sSectorY <= 16 );
00250 
00251       //Now count the number of mobile groups in the sector.
00252       *pubNumTroops = *pubNumElites = *pubNumAdmins = 0;
00253       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00254       while( pGroup )
00255       {
00256             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == sSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == sSectorY )
00257             {
00258                   *pubNumTroops += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;
00259                   *pubNumElites += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;
00260                   *pubNumAdmins += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;
00261             }
00262             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00263       }
00264 
00265       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ];
00266       if( pSector->ubGarrisonID == ROADBLOCK )
00267       { //consider these troops as mobile troops even though they are in a garrison
00268             *pubNumAdmins += pSector->ubNumAdmins;
00269             *pubNumTroops += pSector->ubNumTroops;
00270             *pubNumElites += pSector->ubNumElites;
00271       }
00272 
00273 }

00275 void GetNumberOfMobileEnemiesInSectorWithoutRoadBlock( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 *pubNumAdmins, UINT8 *pubNumTroops, UINT8 *pubNumElites )
00276 {
00277       GROUP *pGroup;
00278       Assert( sSectorX >= 1 && sSectorX <= 16 );
00279       Assert( sSectorY >= 1 && sSectorY <= 16 );
00280 
00281       //Now count the number of mobile groups in the sector.
00282       *pubNumTroops = *pubNumElites = *pubNumAdmins = 0;
00283       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00284       while( pGroup )
00285       {
00286             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == sSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == sSectorY )
00287             {
00288                   *pubNumTroops += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;
00289                   *pubNumElites += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;
00290                   *pubNumAdmins += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;
00291             }
00292             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00293       }
00294 }

00297 void GetNumberOfStationaryEnemiesInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 *pubNumAdmins, UINT8 *pubNumTroops, UINT8 *pubNumElites )
00298 {
00299       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00300       Assert( sSectorX >= 1 && sSectorX <= 16 );
00301       Assert( sSectorY >= 1 && sSectorY <= 16 );
00302       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ];
00303 
00304       //grab the number of each type in the stationary sector
00305       *pubNumAdmins = pSector->ubNumAdmins;
00306       *pubNumTroops = pSector->ubNumTroops;
00307       *pubNumElites = pSector->ubNumElites;
00308 }
00309 
00310 void GetNumberOfEnemiesInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 *pubNumAdmins, UINT8 *pubNumTroops, UINT8 *pubNumElites )
00311 {
00312       UINT8 ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites;
00313       
00314       GetNumberOfStationaryEnemiesInSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, pubNumAdmins, pubNumTroops, pubNumElites );
00315 
00316       GetNumberOfMobileEnemiesInSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, &ubNumAdmins, &ubNumTroops, &ubNumElites );
00317 
00318       *pubNumAdmins += ubNumAdmins;
00319       *pubNumTroops += ubNumTroops;
00320       *pubNumElites += ubNumElites;
00321 }
00322 
00323 void EndTacticalBattleForEnemy()
00324 {
00325       GROUP *pGroup;
00326       INT32 i, iNumMilitia = 0, iNumEnemies = 0;
00327 
00328       //Clear enemies in battle for all stationary groups in the sector.
00329       if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
00330       {
00331             UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector;
00332             pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00333             pSector->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
00334             pSector->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
00335             pSector->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
00336       }
00337       else if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
00338       {
00339             SECTORINFO *pSector;
00340             pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
00341             //grab the number of each type in the stationary sector
00342             pSector->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
00343             pSector->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
00344             pSector->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
00345             pSector->ubNumCreatures = 0;
00346             pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle = 0;
00347       }
00348       else  // negative
00349             return;
00350 
00351       //Clear this value so that profiled enemies can be added into battles in the future.
00352       gfProfiledEnemyAdded = FALSE;
00353 
00354       //Clear enemies in battle for all mobile groups in the sector.
00355       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00356       while( pGroup )
00357       {
00358             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY )
00359             {
00360                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
00361                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
00362                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
00363             }
00364             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00365       }
00366 
00367 
00368       //Check to see if any of our mercs have abandoned the militia during a battle.  This is cause for a rather
00369       //severe loyalty blow.
00370       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00371       {
00372             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bInSector && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00373             { //found one live militia, so look for any enemies/creatures.
00374                   // NOTE: this is relying on ENEMY_TEAM being immediately followed by CREATURE_TEAM
00375                   for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00376                   {
00377                         if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bInSector && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00378                         { //confirmed at least one enemy here, so do the loyalty penalty.
00379                               HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_ABANDON_MILITIA, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
00380                               break;
00381                         }
00382                   }
00383                   break;
00384             }
00385       }
00386 }
00387 
00388 UINT8 NumFreeEnemySlots()
00389 {
00390       UINT8 ubNumFreeSlots = 0;
00391       INT32 i;
00392       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00393       //Count the number of free enemy slots.  It is possible to have multiple groups exceed the maximum.
00394       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM].bLastID; i++ )
00395       {
00396             pSoldier = &Menptr[ i ];
00397             if( !pSoldier->bActive )
00398                   ubNumFreeSlots++;
00399       }
00400       return ubNumFreeSlots;
00401 }
00402 
00403 //Called when entering a sector so the campaign AI can automatically insert the
00404 //correct number of troops of each type based on the current number in the sector
00405 //in global focus (gWorldSectorX/Y)
00406 BOOLEAN PrepareEnemyForSectorBattle()
00407 {
00408       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00409       GROUP *pGroup;
00410       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00411       UINT8 ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites;
00412       UINT8 ubTotalAdmins, ubTotalElites, ubTotalTroops;
00413       UINT8 ubStationaryEnemies;
00414       INT32 i, num;
00415       INT16 sNumSlots;
00416 
00417       gfPendingEnemies = FALSE;
00418 
00419       if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
00420             return PrepareEnemyForUndergroundBattle();
00421 
00422       if( gpBattleGroup && !gpBattleGroup->fPlayer )
00423       { //The enemy has instigated the battle which means they are the ones entering the conflict.
00424             //The player was actually in the sector first, and the enemy doesn't use reinforced placements
00425             HandleArrivalOfReinforcements( gpBattleGroup );
00426             //It is possible that other enemy groups have also arrived.  Add them in the same manner.
00427             pGroup = gpGroupList;
00428             while( pGroup )
00429             {
00430                   if( pGroup != gpBattleGroup && !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle &&
00431                           pGroup->ubSectorX == gpBattleGroup->ubSectorX &&
00432                               pGroup->ubSectorY == gpBattleGroup->ubSectorY &&
00433                               !pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle &&
00434                               !pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle &&
00435                               !pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle )
00436                   {
00437                         HandleArrivalOfReinforcements( pGroup );
00438                   }
00439                   pGroup = pGroup->next;
00440             }
00441             ValidateEnemiesHaveWeapons();
00442             return ( ( BOOLEAN) ( gpBattleGroup->ubGroupSize > 0 ) );
00443       }
00444 
00445       if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
00446       {
00447             if( NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) > 32 )
00448             {
00449                   gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
00450             }
00451       }
00452 
00453       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
00454       if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_USE_MAP_SETTINGS )
00455       { //count the number of enemy placements in a map and use those
00456             SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00457             curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00458             ubTotalAdmins = ubTotalTroops = ubTotalElites = 0;
00459             while( curr )
00460             {
00461                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
00462                   {
00463                         switch( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass )
00464                         {
00465                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:         ubTotalAdmins++;  break;
00466                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:                                    ubTotalTroops++;  break;
00467                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:                                   ubTotalElites++;  break;
00468                         }     
00469                   }
00470                   curr = curr->next;
00471             }
00472             pSector->ubNumAdmins = ubTotalAdmins;
00473             pSector->ubNumTroops = ubTotalTroops;
00474             pSector->ubNumElites = ubTotalElites;
00475             pSector->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
00476             pSector->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
00477             pSector->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
00478       }
00479       else
00480       {
00481             ubTotalAdmins = (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumAdmins - pSector->ubAdminsInBattle);
00482             ubTotalTroops = (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumTroops - pSector->ubTroopsInBattle);
00483             ubTotalElites = (UINT8)(pSector->ubNumElites - pSector->ubElitesInBattle);
00484       }
00485       ubStationaryEnemies = (UINT8)(ubTotalAdmins + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalElites);
00486 
00487       if( ubTotalAdmins + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalElites > 32 )
00488       {
00489             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00490                   ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"The total stationary enemy forces in sector %c%d is %d. (max %d)", 
00491                         gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, ubTotalAdmins + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalElites, 32 );
00492             #endif
00493 
00494             ubTotalAdmins = min( 32, ubTotalAdmins );
00495             ubTotalTroops = min( 32-ubTotalAdmins, ubTotalTroops );
00496             ubTotalElites = min( 32-ubTotalAdmins+ubTotalTroops, ubTotalElites );
00497       }
00498 
00499       pSector->ubAdminsInBattle += ubTotalAdmins;
00500       pSector->ubTroopsInBattle += ubTotalTroops;
00501       pSector->ubElitesInBattle += ubTotalElites;
00502 
00503       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION 
00504       if( gfOverrideSector )
00505       {
00506             //if there are no troops in the current groups, then we're done.
00507             if( !ubTotalAdmins && !ubTotalTroops && !ubTotalElites )
00508                   return FALSE;
00509             AddSoldierInitListEnemyDefenceSoldiers( ubTotalAdmins, ubTotalTroops, ubTotalElites );
00510             ValidateEnemiesHaveWeapons();
00511             return TRUE;
00512       }
00513       #endif
00514 
00515       //Search for movement groups that happen to be in the sector.
00516       sNumSlots = NumFreeEnemySlots();
00517       //Test:  All slots should be free at this point!
00518       if( sNumSlots != gTacticalStatus.Team[ENEMY_TEAM].bLastID - gTacticalStatus.Team[ENEMY_TEAM].bFirstID + 1 )
00519       {
00520             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00521                   ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"All enemy slots should be free at this point.  Only %d of %d are available.\nTrying to add %d admins, %d troops, and %d elites.",
00522                         sNumSlots, gTacticalStatus.Team[ENEMY_TEAM].bLastID - gTacticalStatus.Team[ENEMY_TEAM].bFirstID + 1 ,
00523                         ubTotalAdmins, ubTotalTroops, ubTotalElites );
00524             #endif
00525       }
00526       //Subtract the total number of stationary enemies from the available slots, as stationary forces take
00527       //precendence in combat.  The mobile forces that could also be in the same sector are considered later if
00528       //all the slots fill up.
00529       sNumSlots -= ubTotalAdmins + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalElites;
00530       //Now, process all of the groups and search for both enemy and player groups in the sector.
00531       //For enemy groups, we fill up the slots until we have none left or all of the groups have been 
00532       //processed.
00533       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00534       while( pGroup && sNumSlots )
00535       {
00536             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle &&  
00537                          pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00538             { //Process enemy group in sector.
00539                   if( sNumSlots > 0 )
00540                   {
00541                         ubNumAdmins = (UINT8)(pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins - pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle);
00542                         sNumSlots -= ubNumAdmins;
00543                         if( sNumSlots < 0 )
00544                         { //adjust the value to zero
00545                               ubNumAdmins += sNumSlots;
00546                               sNumSlots = 0;
00547                               gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
00548                         }
00549                         pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle += ubNumAdmins;
00550                         ubTotalAdmins += ubNumAdmins;
00551                   }
00552                   if( sNumSlots > 0 )
00553                   { //Add regular army forces.
00554                         ubNumTroops = (UINT8)(pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops - pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle);
00555                         sNumSlots -= ubNumTroops;
00556                         if( sNumSlots < 0 )
00557                         { //adjust the value to zero
00558                               ubNumTroops += sNumSlots; 
00559                               sNumSlots = 0;
00560                               gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
00561                         }
00562                         pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle += ubNumTroops;
00563                         ubTotalTroops += ubNumTroops;
00564                   }
00565                   if( sNumSlots > 0 )
00566                   { //Add elite troops
00567                         ubNumElites = (UINT8)(pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites - pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle);
00568                         sNumSlots -= ubNumElites;
00569                         if( sNumSlots < 0 )
00570                         { //adjust the value to zero
00571                               ubNumElites += sNumSlots;
00572                               sNumSlots = 0;
00573                               gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
00574                         }
00575                         pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle += ubNumElites;
00576                         ubTotalElites += ubNumElites;
00577                   }
00578                   //NOTE:
00579                   //no provisions for profile troop leader or retreat groups yet.
00580             }
00581             if( pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && !pGroup->fBetweenSectors &&
00582                         pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00583             { //TEMP:  The player path needs to get destroyed, otherwise, it'll be impossible to move the
00584                   //                 group after the battle is resolved.
00585 
00586                   // no one in the group any more continue loop
00587                   if( pGroup->pPlayerList == NULL )
00588                   {
00589                         pGroup = pGroup->next;
00590                         continue;
00591                   }
00592 
00593                   // clear the movt for this grunt and his buddies
00594                   RemoveGroupWaypoints( pGroup->ubGroupID );
00595             }
00596             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00597       }
00598 
00599       //if there are no troops in the current groups, then we're done.
00600       if( !ubTotalAdmins && !ubTotalTroops && !ubTotalElites )
00601       {
00602             return FALSE;
00603       }
00604 
00605       AddSoldierInitListEnemyDefenceSoldiers( ubTotalAdmins, ubTotalTroops, ubTotalElites );
00606 
00607       //Now, we have to go through all of the enemies in the new map, and assign their respective groups if
00608       //in a mobile group, but only for the ones that were assigned from the 
00609       sNumSlots = 32 - ubStationaryEnemies;
00610 
00611       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00612       while( pGroup && sNumSlots )
00613       {
00614             i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; 
00615             pSoldier = &Menptr[ i ];
00616             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00617             {
00618                   num = pGroup->ubGroupSize;
00619                   ubNumAdmins = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle;
00620                   ubNumTroops = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle;
00621                   ubNumElites = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle;
00622                   while( num && sNumSlots && i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bLastID )
00623                   {
00624                         while( !pSoldier->bActive || pSoldier->ubGroupID )
00625                         {
00626                               pSoldier = &Menptr[ ++i ];
00627                               if( i > gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bLastID )
00628                               {
00629                                     AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to assign battle counters for enemies properly. Please send save. KM:0." );
00630                               }
00631                         }
00632                         switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
00633                         {
00634                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
00635                                     if( ubNumAdmins )
00636                                     {
00637                                           num--;
00638                                           sNumSlots--;
00639                                           ubNumAdmins--;
00640                                           pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00641                                     }
00642                                     break;
00643                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
00644                                     if( ubNumTroops )
00645                                     {
00646                                           num--;
00647                                           sNumSlots--;
00648                                           ubNumTroops--;
00649                                           pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00650                                     }
00651                                     break;
00652                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
00653                                     if( ubNumElites )
00654                                     {
00655                                           num--;
00656                                           sNumSlots--;
00657                                           ubNumElites--;
00658                                           pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00659                                     }
00660                                     break;
00661                         }
00662                         pSoldier = &Menptr[ ++i ];
00663                   }
00664             }
00665             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00666       }
00667 
00668       ValidateEnemiesHaveWeapons();
00669 
00670       return TRUE;
00671 }
00672 
00673 BOOLEAN PrepareEnemyForUndergroundBattle()
00674 {
00675       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pUnderground;
00676       UINT8 ubTotalAdmins, ubTotalTroops, ubTotalElites;
00677       pUnderground = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
00678       while( pUnderground )
00679       {
00680             if( pUnderground->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
00681                     pUnderground->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY &&
00682                         pUnderground->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
00683             { //This is the sector we are going to be fighting in.
00684                   if( pUnderground->ubNumAdmins || pUnderground->ubNumTroops || pUnderground->ubNumElites )
00685                   {
00686                         ubTotalAdmins = (UINT8)(pUnderground->ubNumAdmins - pUnderground->ubAdminsInBattle);
00687                         ubTotalTroops = (UINT8)(pUnderground->ubNumTroops - pUnderground->ubTroopsInBattle);
00688                         ubTotalElites = (UINT8)(pUnderground->ubNumElites - pUnderground->ubElitesInBattle);
00689                         pUnderground->ubAdminsInBattle += ubTotalAdmins;
00690                         pUnderground->ubTroopsInBattle += ubTotalTroops;
00691                         pUnderground->ubElitesInBattle += ubTotalElites;
00692                         AddSoldierInitListEnemyDefenceSoldiers( pUnderground->ubNumAdmins, pUnderground->ubNumTroops, pUnderground->ubNumElites );
00693                         ValidateEnemiesHaveWeapons();
00694                   }
00695                   return ( ( BOOLEAN) ( pUnderground->ubNumAdmins + pUnderground->ubNumTroops + pUnderground->ubNumElites > 0 ) );
00696             }
00697             pUnderground = pUnderground->next;
00698       }
00699 
00700       // underground sector not found in list
00701       Assert( FALSE );
00702       return FALSE;
00703 }
00704 
00705 //The queen AI layer must process the event by subtracting forces, etc.
00706 void ProcessQueenCmdImplicationsOfDeath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00707 {
00708       INT32 iNumEnemiesInSector;
00709       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00710 //    UINT16 str[128];
00711       INT32 iMaxEnemyGroupSize = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxEnemyGroupSize;
00712 DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"QueenCommand");
00713 
00714       EvaluateDeathEffectsToSoldierInitList( pSoldier );
00715 
00716       switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
00717       {
00718             case MIKE:
00719             case IGGY:
00720                   if( pSoldier->ubProfile == IGGY && !gubFact[ FACT_IGGY_AVAILABLE_TO_ARMY ] )
00721                   { //Iggy is on our team!
00722                         break;
00723                   }
00724                   if( !pSoldier->bSectorZ )
00725                   {
00726                         pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY ) ];
00727                         if( pSector->ubNumElites )
00728                         {
00729                               pSector->ubNumElites--;
00730                         }
00731                         if( pSector->ubElitesInBattle )
00732                         {
00733                               pSector->ubElitesInBattle--;
00734                         }
00735                   }
00736                   else
00737                   {
00738                         UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pUnderground;
00739                         pUnderground = FindUnderGroundSector( (UINT8)pSoldier->sSectorX, (UINT8)pSoldier->sSectorY, (UINT8)pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00740                         Assert( pUnderground );
00741                         if( pUnderground->ubNumElites )
00742                         {
00743                               pUnderground->ubNumElites--;
00744                         }
00745                         if( pUnderground->ubElitesInBattle )
00746                         {
00747                               pUnderground->ubElitesInBattle--;
00748                         }
00749                   }
00750                   break;
00751       }
00752 
00753       if( pSoldier->bNeutral || pSoldier->bTeam != ENEMY_TEAM && pSoldier->bTeam != CREATURE_TEAM )
00754             return;
00755       //we are recording an enemy death
00756       if( pSoldier->ubGroupID )
00757       { //The enemy was in a mobile group
00758             GROUP *pGroup;
00759             pGroup = GetGroup( pSoldier->ubGroupID );
00760             if( !pGroup )
00761             {
00762                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00763                         UINT16 str[256];
00764                         swprintf( str, L"Enemy soldier killed with ubGroupID of %d, and the group doesn't exist!", pSoldier->ubGroupID );
00765                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00766                   #endif
00767                   return;
00768             }
00769             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
00770             {
00771                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00772                         UINT16 str[256];
00773                         swprintf( str, L"Attempting to process player group thinking it's an enemy group in ProcessQueenCmdImplicationsOfDeath()", pSoldier->ubGroupID );
00774                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00775                   #endif
00776                   return;
00777             }
00778             switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
00779             {
00780                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
00781                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00782                               if( !pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites )
00783                               {
00784                                     //swprintf( str, L"Enemy elite killed with ubGroupID of %d, but the group doesn't contain elites!", pGroup->ubGroupID );
00785                                     //DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00786                                     break;
00787                               }
00788                               if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00789                               {
00790                                     if( pGroup->ubGroupSize <= iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites != pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle && !gfPendingEnemies ||
00791                                                 pGroup->ubGroupSize > iMaxEnemyGroupSize || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites > 50 || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle > 50 )
00792                                     {
00793                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Group elite counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00794                                     }
00795                               }
00796                         #endif
00797                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites )
00798                         {
00799                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites--;
00800                         }
00801                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle )
00802                         {
00803                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle--;
00804                         }
00805                         break;
00806                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
00807                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00808                               if( !pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops )
00809                               {
00810                                     //swprintf( str, L"Enemy troop killed with ubGroupID of %d, but the group doesn't contain elites!", pGroup->ubGroupID );
00811                                     //DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00812                                     break;
00813                               }
00814                               if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00815                               {
00816                                     if( pGroup->ubGroupSize <= iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops != pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle && !gfPendingEnemies ||
00817                                                 pGroup->ubGroupSize > iMaxEnemyGroupSize || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops > 50 || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle > 50 )
00818                                     {
00819                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Group troop counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00820                                     }
00821                               }
00822                         #endif
00823                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops )
00824                         {
00825                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops--;
00826                         }
00827                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle )
00828                         {
00829                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle--;
00830                         }
00831                         break;
00832                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
00833                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00834                               if( !pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins )
00835                               {
00836                                     //swprintf( str, L"Enemy administrator killed with ubGroupID of %d, but the group doesn't contain elites!", pGroup->ubGroupID );
00837                                     //DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00838                                     break;
00839                               }
00840                               if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00841                               {
00842                                     if( pGroup->ubGroupSize <= iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins != pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle && !gfPendingEnemies ||
00843                                     pGroup->ubGroupSize > iMaxEnemyGroupSize || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins > 50 || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle > 50 )
00844                                     {
00845                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Group admin counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00846                                     }
00847                               }
00848                         #endif
00849                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins )
00850                         {
00851                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins--;
00852                         }
00853                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle )
00854                         {
00855                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle--;
00856                         }
00857                         break;
00858             }
00859             if( pGroup->ubGroupSize )
00860                   pGroup->ubGroupSize--;
00861             RecalculateGroupWeight( pGroup );
00862             if( !pGroup->ubGroupSize )
00863             {
00864                   RemovePGroup( pGroup );
00865             }
00866       }
00867       else
00868       { //The enemy was in a stationary defence group
00869             if( !gbWorldSectorZ || IsAutoResolveActive() )
00870             { //ground level (SECTORINFO)
00871                   SECTORINFO *pSector;
00872                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00873                   UINT32 ubTotalEnemies;
00874                   #endif
00875                   
00876 //                if( !IsAutoResolveActive() )
00877 //                {
00878                         pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY ) ];
00879 //                }
00880 //                else
00881 //                {
00882 //                      pSector = &SectorInfo[ GetAutoResolveSectorID() ];
00883 //                }
00884 
00885                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION   
00886                         ubTotalEnemies = pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites;
00887                   #endif
00888 
00889                   switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
00890                   {
00891                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
00892                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00893                                     if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00894                                     {
00895                                           if( ubTotalEnemies <= 32 && pSector->ubNumAdmins != pSector->ubAdminsInBattle ||
00896                                                 !pSector->ubNumAdmins || !pSector->ubAdminsInBattle ||
00897                                                 pSector->ubNumAdmins > 100 || pSector->ubAdminsInBattle > 32 )
00898                                           {
00899                                                 DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Sector admin counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00900                                           }
00901                                     }
00902                               #endif
00903                               if( pSector->ubNumAdmins )
00904                               {
00905                                     pSector->ubNumAdmins--;
00906                               }
00907                               if( pSector->ubAdminsInBattle )
00908                               {
00909                                     pSector->ubAdminsInBattle--;
00910                               }
00911                               break;
00912                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
00913                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00914                                     if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00915                                     {
00916                                           if( ubTotalEnemies <= 32 && pSector->ubNumTroops != pSector->ubTroopsInBattle ||
00917                                                       !pSector->ubNumTroops || !pSector->ubTroopsInBattle ||
00918                                                       pSector->ubNumTroops > 100 || pSector->ubTroopsInBattle > 32 )
00919                                           {
00920                                                 DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Sector troop counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00921                                           }
00922                                     }
00923                               #endif
00924                               if( pSector->ubNumTroops )
00925                               {
00926                                     pSector->ubNumTroops--;
00927                               }
00928                               if( pSector->ubTroopsInBattle )
00929                               {
00930                                     pSector->ubTroopsInBattle--;
00931                               }
00932                               break;
00933                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
00934                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00935                                     if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00936                                     {
00937                                           if( ubTotalEnemies <= 32 && pSector->ubNumElites != pSector->ubElitesInBattle ||
00938                                                       !pSector->ubNumElites || !pSector->ubElitesInBattle ||
00939                                                       pSector->ubNumElites > 100 || pSector->ubElitesInBattle > 32 )
00940                                           {
00941                                                 DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Sector elite counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00942                                           }
00943                                     }
00944                               #endif
00945                               if( pSector->ubNumElites )
00946                               {
00947                                     pSector->ubNumElites--;
00948                               }
00949                               if( pSector->ubElitesInBattle )
00950                               {
00951                                     pSector->ubElitesInBattle--;
00952                               }
00953                               break;
00954                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_CREATURE:
00955                               if( pSoldier->ubBodyType != BLOODCAT )
00956                               {
00957                                     #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00958                                           if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00959                                           {
00960                                                 if( ubTotalEnemies <= (UINT32)iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pSector->ubNumCreatures != pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle ||
00961                                                             !pSector->ubNumCreatures || !pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle ||
00962                                                             pSector->ubNumCreatures > 50 || pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle > 50 )
00963                                                 {
00964                                                       DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Sector creature counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00965                                                 }
00966                                           }
00967                                     #endif
00968                                     if( pSector->ubNumCreatures )
00969                                     {
00970                                           pSector->ubNumCreatures--;
00971                                     }
00972                                     if( pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle )
00973                                     {
00974                                           pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle--;
00975                                     }
00976                               }
00977                               else
00978                               {
00979                                     if( pSector->bBloodCats )
00980                                     {
00981                                           pSector->bBloodCats--;
00982                                     }
00983                               }
00984 
00985                               break;
00986                   }
00987                   RecalculateSectorWeight( (UINT8)SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY ) );
00988             }
00989             else
00990             { //basement level (UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO)
00991                   UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00992                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00993                   UINT32 ubTotalEnemies = pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites;
00994                   #endif
00995                   if( pSector )
00996                   {
00997                         switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
00998                         {
00999                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
01000                                     #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01001                                     if( ubTotalEnemies <= (UINT32)iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pSector->ubNumAdmins != pSector->ubAdminsInBattle ||
01002                                                 !pSector->ubNumAdmins || !pSector->ubAdminsInBattle ||
01003                                                 pSector->ubNumAdmins > 100 || pSector->ubAdminsInBattle > iMaxEnemyGroupSize )
01004                                     {
01005                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Underground sector admin counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01006                                     }
01007                                     #endif
01008                                     if( pSector->ubNumAdmins )
01009                                     {
01010                                           pSector->ubNumAdmins--;
01011                                     }
01012                                     if( pSector->ubAdminsInBattle )
01013                                     {
01014                                           pSector->ubAdminsInBattle--;
01015                                     }
01016                                     break;
01017                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
01018                                     #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01019                                     if( ubTotalEnemies <= (UINT32)iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pSector->ubNumTroops != pSector->ubTroopsInBattle ||
01020                                                 !pSector->ubNumTroops || !pSector->ubTroopsInBattle ||
01021                                                 pSector->ubNumTroops > 100 || pSector->ubTroopsInBattle > iMaxEnemyGroupSize )
01022                                     {
01023                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Underground sector troop counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01024                                     }
01025                                     #endif
01026                                     if( pSector->ubNumTroops )
01027                                     {
01028                                           pSector->ubNumTroops--;
01029                                     }
01030                                     if( pSector->ubTroopsInBattle )
01031                                     {
01032                                           pSector->ubTroopsInBattle--;
01033                                     }
01034                                     break;
01035                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
01036                                     #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01037                                     if( ubTotalEnemies <= (UINT32)iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pSector->ubNumElites != pSector->ubElitesInBattle ||
01038                                                 !pSector->ubNumElites || !pSector->ubElitesInBattle ||
01039                                                 pSector->ubNumElites > 100 || pSector->ubElitesInBattle > iMaxEnemyGroupSize )
01040                                     {
01041                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Underground sector elite counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01042                                     }
01043                                     #endif
01044                                     if( pSector->ubNumElites )
01045                                     {
01046                                           pSector->ubNumElites--;
01047                                     }
01048                                     if( pSector->ubElitesInBattle )
01049                                     {
01050                                           pSector->ubElitesInBattle--;
01051                                     }
01052                                     break;
01053                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_CREATURE:
01054                                     #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01055                                     if( ubTotalEnemies <= (UINT32)iMaxEnemyGroupSize && pSector->ubNumCreatures != pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle ||
01056                                                 !pSector->ubNumCreatures || !pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle ||
01057                                                 pSector->ubNumCreatures > 50 || pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle > 50 )
01058                                     {
01059                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Underground sector creature counters are bad.  What were the last 2-3 things to die, and how?  Save game and send to KM with info!!!", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01060                                     }
01061                                     #endif
01062                                     if( pSector->ubNumCreatures )
01063                                     {
01064                                           pSector->ubNumCreatures--;
01065                                     }
01066                                     if( pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle )
01067                                     {
01068                                           pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle--;
01069                                     }
01070 
01071                                     if( !pSector->ubNumCreatures && gWorldSectorX != 9 && gWorldSectorY != 10 )
01072                                     { //If the player has successfully killed all creatures in ANY underground sector except J9
01073                                           //then cancel any pending creature town attack.
01074                                           DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_CREATURE_ATTACK );
01075                                     }
01076 
01077                                     // a monster has died.  Post an event to immediately check whether a mine has been cleared.
01078                                     AddStrategicEventUsingSeconds( EVENT_CHECK_IF_MINE_CLEARED, GetWorldTotalSeconds() + 15, 0);
01079 
01080                                     if( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
01081                                     {
01082                                           //Need to call this, as the queen is really big, and killing her leaves a bunch 
01083                                           //of bad tiles in behind her.  Calling this function cleans it up.
01084                                           InvalidateWorldRedundency();
01085                                           //Now that the queen is dead, turn off the creature quest.
01086                                           EndCreatureQuest();
01087                                           EndQuest( QUEST_CREATURES, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01088                                     }
01089                                     break;
01090                         }
01091                   }
01092             }
01093       }
01094       if( !pSoldier->bSectorZ )
01095       {
01096             pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY ) ];
01097             iNumEnemiesInSector = NumEnemiesInSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY );
01098             if( iNumEnemiesInSector )
01099             {
01100                   if( pSector->bLastKnownEnemies >= 0 )
01101                   {
01102                         pSector->bLastKnownEnemies = (INT8)iNumEnemiesInSector;
01103                   }
01104             }
01105             else
01106             {
01107                   pSector->bLastKnownEnemies = 0;
01108             }
01109       }
01110 }
01111 
01112 //Rarely, there will be more enemies than supported by the engine.  In this case, these
01113 //soldier's are waiting for a slot to be free so that they can enter the battle.  This
01114 //essentially allows for an infinite number of troops, though only 32 at a time can fight.
01115 //This is also called whenever an enemy group's reinforcements arrive because the code is
01116 //identical, though it is highly likely that they will all be successfully added on the first call.
01117 void AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle()
01118 {
01119       UINT8 ubSlots, ubNumAvailable;
01120       UINT8 ubNumElites, ubNumTroops, ubNumAdmins;
01121       GROUP *pGroup;
01122       SECTORINFO *pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
01123       static UINT8 ubPredefinedInsertionCode = 255;
01124 
01125       if( ( !PlayerMercsInSector( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY, 0 ) && !CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) )
01126             || !NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ) return;
01127 
01128 
01129 /*    if( !gfPendingEnemies )
01130       { //Optimization.  No point in checking if we know that there aren't any more enemies that can
01131             //be added to this battle.  This changes whenever a new enemy group arrives at the scene.
01132             return;
01133       }*/
01134       ubSlots = NumFreeEnemySlots();
01135       if( !ubSlots )
01136       { //no available slots to add enemies to.  Try again later...
01137             return;
01138       }
01139 
01140       if( pSector->ubNumElites + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumAdmins )
01141       {
01142             ubNumElites = ubNumTroops = ubNumAdmins = 0;
01143 
01144             ubNumAvailable = pSector->ubNumElites + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumAdmins - pSector->ubElitesInBattle - pSector->ubTroopsInBattle - pSector->ubAdminsInBattle;
01145             while( ubNumAvailable && ubSlots )
01146             { //This group has enemies waiting for a chance to enter the battle.
01147                   if( pSector->ubElitesInBattle < pSector->ubNumElites )
01148                   { //Add an elite troop
01149                         pSector->ubElitesInBattle++;
01150                         ubNumAvailable--;
01151                         ubSlots--;
01152                         ubNumElites++;
01153                   }
01154                   else if( pSector->ubTroopsInBattle < pSector->ubNumTroops )
01155                   { //Add a regular troop.
01156                         pSector->ubTroopsInBattle++;
01157                         ubNumAvailable--;
01158                         ubSlots--;
01159                         ubNumTroops++;
01160                   }
01161                   else if( pSector->ubAdminsInBattle < pSector->ubNumAdmins )
01162                   { //Add an elite troop
01163                         pSector->ubAdminsInBattle++;
01164                         ubNumAvailable--;
01165                         ubSlots--;
01166                         ubNumAdmins++;
01167                   }
01168                   else
01169                   {
01170                         AssertMsg( 0, "AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle():  Logic Error -- by Kris" );
01171                   }
01172             }
01173 
01174 
01175             if( ubNumAdmins || ubNumTroops || ubNumElites )
01176             {     //This group has contributed forces, then add them now, because different
01177                   //groups appear on different sides of the map.
01178                   UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubPredefinedInsertionCode;
01179                   //First, determine which entrypoint to use, based on the travel direction of the group.
01180 
01181                   if( ubStrategicInsertionCode == 255 )
01182                   {
01183                         if( NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX + 1, gWorldSectorY ) )
01184                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
01185                         else if( NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX - 1, gWorldSectorY ) )
01186                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
01187                         else if( NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY + 1 ) )
01188                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
01189                         else if( NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY - 1 ) )
01190                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
01191                   }
01192 
01193                   if( ubStrategicInsertionCode == 255 )
01194                   {
01195                         if( !CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX + 1, gWorldSectorY ) )
01196                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
01197                         else if( !CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX - 1, gWorldSectorY ) )
01198                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
01199                         else if( !CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY + 1 ) )
01200                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
01201                         else if( !CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY - 1 ) )
01202                               ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
01203                   }
01204                   
01205                   if( ubStrategicInsertionCode < INSERTION_CODE_NORTH ||ubStrategicInsertionCode > INSERTION_CODE_WEST )
01206                         ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH + Random( 4 );
01207 
01208                   AddEnemiesToBattle( 0, ubStrategicInsertionCode, ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites, FALSE );
01209                   gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
01210             }
01211       }
01212 
01213       ubPredefinedInsertionCode = 255;
01214 
01215       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01216       while( pGroup && ubSlots )
01217       {
01218             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
01219             { //This enemy group is currently in the sector.
01220                   ubNumElites = ubNumTroops = ubNumAdmins = 0;
01221                   ubNumAvailable = pGroup->ubGroupSize - pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle - pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle - pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle;
01222                   while( ubNumAvailable && ubSlots )
01223                   { //This group has enemies waiting for a chance to enter the battle.
01224                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle < pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites )
01225                         { //Add an elite troop
01226                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle++;
01227                               ubNumAvailable--;
01228                               ubSlots--;
01229                               ubNumElites++;
01230                         }
01231                         else if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle < pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops )
01232                         { //Add a regular troop.
01233                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle++;
01234                               ubNumAvailable--;
01235                               ubSlots--;
01236                               ubNumTroops++;
01237                         }
01238                         else if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle < pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins )
01239                         { //Add an admin troop
01240                               pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle++;
01241                               ubNumAvailable--;
01242                               ubSlots--;
01243                               ubNumAdmins++;
01244                         }
01245                         else
01246                         {
01247                               AssertMsg( 0, "AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle():  Logic Error -- by Kris" );
01248                         }
01249                   }
01250                   if( ubNumAdmins || ubNumTroops || ubNumElites )
01251                   { //This group has contributed forces, then add them now, because different
01252                         //groups appear on different sides of the map.
01253                         UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode=0;
01254                         //First, determine which entrypoint to use, based on the travel direction of the group.
01255                         if( pGroup->ubPrevX && pGroup->ubPrevY )
01256                         {
01257                               if( pGroup->ubSectorX < pGroup->ubPrevX )
01258                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
01259                               else if( pGroup->ubSectorX > pGroup->ubPrevX )
01260                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
01261                               else if( pGroup->ubSectorY < pGroup->ubPrevY )
01262                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
01263                               else if( pGroup->ubSectorY > pGroup->ubPrevY )
01264                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
01265                         }
01266                         else if( pGroup->ubNextX && pGroup->ubNextY )
01267                         {
01268                               if( pGroup->ubSectorX < pGroup->ubNextX )
01269                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
01270                               else if( pGroup->ubSectorX > pGroup->ubNextX )
01271                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
01272                               else if( pGroup->ubSectorY < pGroup->ubNextY )
01273                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
01274                               else if( pGroup->ubSectorY > pGroup->ubNextY )
01275                                     ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
01276                         }
01277                         //Add the number of each type of troop and place them in the appropriate positions
01278                         AddEnemiesToBattle( pGroup, ubStrategicInsertionCode, ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites, FALSE );
01279                         gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
01280                   }
01281             }
01282             pGroup = pGroup->next;
01283       }
01284       if( ubSlots )
01285       { //After going through the process, we have finished with some free slots and no more enemies to add.
01286     //So, we can turn off the flag, as this check is no longer needed.
01287             gfPendingEnemies = FALSE;
01288             
01289             if( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition == TRUE )
01290                   ubPredefinedInsertionCode = DoReinforcementAsPendingEnemy( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01291             else 
01292                   ubPredefinedInsertionCode = 255;
01293 
01294             if( ubPredefinedInsertionCode != 255 )
01295                   AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle();
01296       }
01297 }
01298 
01299 void NotifyPlayersOfNewEnemies()
01300 {
01301       INT32 iSoldiers, iChosenSoldier, i;
01302       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01303       BOOLEAN fIgnoreBreath = FALSE;
01304 
01305       iSoldiers = 0;
01306       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01307       { //find a merc that is aware.
01308             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01309             if( pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bBreath >= OKBREATH )
01310             {
01311                   iSoldiers++;
01312             }
01313       }
01314       if( !iSoldiers )
01315       { // look for an out of breath merc.
01316             fIgnoreBreath = TRUE;
01317 
01318             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01319             { //find a merc that is aware.
01320                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01321                   if( pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01322                   {
01323                         iSoldiers++;
01324                   }
01325             }
01326       }
01327       if( iSoldiers )
01328       {
01329             iChosenSoldier = Random( iSoldiers );
01330             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01331             { //find a merc that is aware.
01332                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01333                   if( pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE &&
01334                         ( ( pSoldier->bBreath >= OKBREATH ) || fIgnoreBreath ) )
01335                   {
01336                         if( !iChosenSoldier )
01337                         {
01338                               // ATE: This is to allow special handling of initial heli drop
01339                               if ( !DidGameJustStart() )
01340                               {
01341                                     TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, 0, 0, 0 );
01342                               }
01343                               return;
01344                         }
01345                         iChosenSoldier--;
01346                   }
01347             }
01348       }
01349       else
01350       { //There is either nobody here or our mercs can't talk
01351 
01352       }
01353 }
01354 
01355 void AddEnemiesToBattle( GROUP *pGroup, UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode, UINT8 ubNumAdmins, UINT8 ubNumTroops, UINT8 ubNumElites, BOOLEAN fMagicallyAppeared )
01356 {
01357       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01358       MAPEDGEPOINTINFO MapEdgepointInfo;
01359       UINT8 ubCurrSlot;
01360       UINT8 ubTotalSoldiers;
01361       UINT8 bDesiredDirection=0;
01362       switch( ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01363       {
01364             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    bDesiredDirection = SOUTHEAST;                                                            break;
01365             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:           bDesiredDirection = SOUTHWEST;                                                            break;
01366             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    bDesiredDirection = NORTHWEST;                                                            break;
01367             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:           bDesiredDirection = NORTHEAST;                                                            break;
01368             default:  AssertMsg( 0, "Illegal direction passed to AddEnemiesToBattle()" ); break;
01369       }
01370       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01371             ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Enemy reinforcements have arrived!  (%d admins, %d troops, %d elite)", ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites );
01372       #endif
01373 
01374       if( fMagicallyAppeared )
01375       { //update the strategic counters 
01376             if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
01377             {
01378                   SECTORINFO *pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
01379                   pSector->ubNumAdmins                += ubNumAdmins;
01380                   pSector->ubAdminsInBattle     += ubNumAdmins;
01381                   pSector->ubNumTroops                += ubNumTroops;
01382                   pSector->ubTroopsInBattle     += ubNumTroops;
01383                   pSector->ubNumElites                += ubNumElites;
01384                   pSector->ubElitesInBattle     += ubNumElites;
01385             }
01386             else
01387             {
01388                   UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01389                   if( pSector )
01390                   {
01391                         pSector->ubNumAdmins                += ubNumAdmins;
01392                         pSector->ubAdminsInBattle     += ubNumAdmins;
01393                         pSector->ubNumTroops                += ubNumTroops;
01394                         pSector->ubTroopsInBattle     += ubNumTroops;
01395                         pSector->ubNumElites                += ubNumElites;
01396                         pSector->ubElitesInBattle     += ubNumElites;
01397                   }
01398             }
01399             //Because the enemies magically appeared, have one of our soldiers say something...
01400             NotifyPlayersOfNewEnemies();
01401       }
01402 
01403       ubTotalSoldiers = ubNumAdmins + ubNumTroops + ubNumElites;
01404 
01405       ChooseMapEdgepoints( &MapEdgepointInfo, ubStrategicInsertionCode, (UINT8)(ubNumAdmins+ubNumElites+ubNumTroops) );
01406       ubCurrSlot = 0;
01407       while( ubTotalSoldiers )
01408       {
01409             if( ubNumElites && Random( ubTotalSoldiers ) < ubNumElites )
01410             {
01411                   ubNumElites--;
01412                   ubTotalSoldiers--;
01413                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateEliteEnemy();
01414                   if( pGroup )
01415                   {
01416                         pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
01417                   }
01418 
01419                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = bDesiredDirection;
01420                   //Setup the position
01421                   if( ubCurrSlot < MapEdgepointInfo.ubNumPoints )
01422                   { //using an edgepoint
01423                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01424                         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = MapEdgepointInfo.sGridNo[ ubCurrSlot++ ];
01425                   }
01426                   else 
01427                   { //no edgepoints left, so put him at the entrypoint.
01428                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01429                   }
01430                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
01431             }
01432             else if( ubNumTroops && (UINT8)Random( ubTotalSoldiers ) < (UINT8)(ubNumElites + ubNumTroops) )
01433             {
01434                   ubNumTroops--;
01435                   ubTotalSoldiers--;
01436                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateArmyTroop();
01437                   if( pGroup )
01438                   {
01439                         pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
01440                   }
01441 
01442                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = bDesiredDirection;
01443                   //Setup the position
01444                   if( ubCurrSlot < MapEdgepointInfo.ubNumPoints )
01445                   { //using an edgepoint
01446                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01447                         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = MapEdgepointInfo.sGridNo[ ubCurrSlot++ ];
01448                   }
01449                   else 
01450                   { //no edgepoints left, so put him at the entrypoint.
01451                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01452                   }
01453                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
01454             }
01455             else if( ubNumAdmins && (UINT8)Random( ubTotalSoldiers ) < (UINT8)(ubNumElites + ubNumTroops + ubNumAdmins) )
01456             {
01457                   ubNumAdmins--;
01458                   ubTotalSoldiers--;
01459                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateAdministrator();
01460                   if( pGroup )
01461                   {
01462                         pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
01463                   }
01464 
01465                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = bDesiredDirection;
01466                   //Setup the position
01467                   if( ubCurrSlot < MapEdgepointInfo.ubNumPoints )
01468                   { //using an edgepoint
01469                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01470                         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = MapEdgepointInfo.sGridNo[ ubCurrSlot++ ];
01471                   }
01472                   else 
01473                   { //no edgepoints left, so put him at the entrypoint.
01474                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01475                   }
01476                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
01477             }
01478       }
01479 }
01480 
01481 
01482 
01483 
01484 BOOLEAN SaveUnderGroundSectorInfoToSaveGame( HWFILE hFile )
01485 {
01486       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
01487       UINT32      uiNumOfRecords=0;
01488       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01489 
01490       //Loop through all the nodes to count how many there are
01491       while( TempNode )
01492       {
01493             uiNumOfRecords++;
01494             TempNode = TempNode->next;
01495       }
01496 
01497 
01498       //Write how many nodes there are
01499       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumOfRecords, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01500       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01501       {
01502             return(FALSE);
01503       }
01504 
01505       TempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01506 
01507       //Go through each node and save it.
01508       while( TempNode )
01509       {
01510             FileWrite( hFile, TempNode, sizeof( UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01511             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO ) )
01512             {
01513                   return(FALSE);
01514             }
01515             
01516             TempNode = TempNode->next;
01517       }
01518 
01519       return( TRUE );
01520 }
01521 
01522 BOOLEAN LoadUnderGroundSectorInfoFromSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
01523 {
01524       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
01525       UINT32      uiNumOfRecords=0;
01526       UINT32      cnt=0;
01527       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempNode = NULL;
01528       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempSpot = NULL;
01529 
01530       //Clear the current LL
01531       TrashUndergroundSectorInfo();
01532 
01533       //Read in the number of nodes stored
01534       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumOfRecords, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01535       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01536       {
01537             return(FALSE);
01538       }
01539 
01540       for( cnt = 0; cnt< uiNumOfRecords; cnt ++)
01541       {
01542 
01543             //Malloc space for the new node
01544             TempNode = (UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO ) );
01545             if( TempNode == NULL )
01546                   return( FALSE );
01547 
01548 
01549             //read in the new node
01550             FileRead( hFile, TempNode, sizeof( UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01551             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO ) )
01552             {
01553                   return(FALSE);
01554             }
01555 
01556             //If its the first time in, assign the node to the list
01557             if( cnt == 0 )
01558             {
01559                   gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead = TempNode;
01560                   TempSpot = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01561                   TempSpot->next = NULL;
01562             }
01563             else
01564             {
01565                   //assign the new node to the LL
01566                   TempSpot->next = TempNode;
01567 
01568                   //advance to the next node
01569                   TempSpot = TempSpot->next;
01570                   TempSpot->next = NULL;
01571                   gpUndergroundSectorInfoTail = TempSpot;
01572             }
01573 
01574       }
01575 
01576 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01577       if( !uiNumOfRecords )
01578       {
01579             BuildUndergroundSectorInfoList();
01580             gfClearCreatureQuest = TRUE;
01581       }
01582 #endif
01583 
01584       return( TRUE );
01585 }
01586 
01587 
01588 UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO* FindUnderGroundSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 bMapZ )
01589 {
01590       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pUnderground;
01591       pUnderground = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01592 
01593       //Loop through all the underground sectors looking for specified sector
01594       while( pUnderground )
01595       {
01596             //If the sector is the right one
01597             if( pUnderground->ubSectorX == sMapX && 
01598                     pUnderground->ubSectorY == sMapY &&
01599                         pUnderground->ubSectorZ == bMapZ )
01600             { 
01601                   return( pUnderground );
01602             }
01603             pUnderground = pUnderground->next;
01604       }
01605 
01606 
01607       return( NULL );
01608 }
