01613 void BeginCaptureSquence( )
01614 {
01615       if( !( gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE ) || !( gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_ESCAPE ) )
01616       {
01617             gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue = 0;
01618       }
01619 }
01620 
01621 void EndCaptureSequence( )
01622 {
01623 
01624       // Set flag...
01625       if( !( gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE ) || !(gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_ESCAPE) )
01626       {
01627             // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing multiple captures:
01628             //gStrategicStatus.uiFlags |= STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE;
01629 
01630             if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01631             {
01632                   // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing multiple captures:
01633                   gStrategicStatus.uiFlags |= STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE;
01634                   StartQuest( QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01635             }
01636             // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing multiple captures:
01637             //else if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTDONE )
01638             else if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTDONE && gubQuest[ QUEST_INTERROGATION ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01639             {
01640                   StartQuest( QUEST_INTERROGATION, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01641                   // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing multiple captures:
01642                   gStrategicStatus.uiFlags |= STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_ESCAPE;
01643 
01644                   // OK! - Schedule Meanwhile now!
01645                   {
01646                         MEANWHILE_DEFINITION MeanwhileDef;
01647 
01648                         MeanwhileDef.sSectorX = 7;
01649                         MeanwhileDef.sSectorY = 14;
01650                         MeanwhileDef.ubNPCNumber = QUEEN;
01651                         MeanwhileDef.usTriggerEvent = 0;
01652                         MeanwhileDef.ubMeanwhileID = INTERROGATION;
01653 
01654                         ScheduleMeanwhileEvent( &MeanwhileDef, 10 );
01655                   }
01656             }
01657             // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing multiple captures
01658             else 
01659             {
01660                   // !?!? set both flags
01661                   gStrategicStatus.uiFlags |= STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE;
01662                   gStrategicStatus.uiFlags |= STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_ESCAPE;
01663             }
01664       }
01665 
01666 }
01667 
01668 void EnemyCapturesPlayerSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01669 {
01670       INT32                         i;
01671       WORLDITEM               WorldItem;
01672   BOOLEAN       fMadeCorpse;
01673   INT32         iNumEnemiesInSector;
01674 
01675 
01676       static INT16 sAlmaCaptureGridNos[] = { 9208, 9688, 9215 };
01677       static INT16 sAlmaCaptureItemsGridNo[] = { 12246, 12406, 13046 };
01678 
01679       static INT16 sInterrogationItemGridNo[] = { 12089, 12089, 12089 };
01680       
01681 
01682   // ATE: Check first if ! in player captured sequence already
01683       // CJC Dec 1 2002: fixing multiple captures
01684       if ( ( gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE ) && (gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_ESCAPE) )
01685   {
01686     return;
01687   }
01688 
01689   // ATE: If maximum prisoners captured, return!
01690   if ( gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue > 3 )
01691   {
01692     return;
01693   }
01694 
01695 
01696   // If this is an EPC , just kill them...
01697   if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
01698   {
01699         pSoldier->bLife = 0;
01700     HandleSoldierDeath( pSoldier, &fMadeCorpse );
01701     return;
01702   }
01703 
01704   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01705   {
01706     return;
01707   }
01708 
01709   // ATE: Patch fix If in a vehicle, remove from vehicle...
01710   TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier ); 
01711 
01712 
01713   // Are there anemies in ALMA? ( I13 )
01714   iNumEnemiesInSector = NumEnemiesInSector( 13, 9 );
01715 
01716   // IF there are no enemies, and we need to do alma, skip!
01717   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED && iNumEnemiesInSector == 0 )
01718   {
01719         InternalStartQuest( QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, FALSE );
01720         InternalEndQuest( QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, FALSE );
01721   }
01722 
01723       HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_MERC_CAPTURED, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
01724 
01725       // Change to POW....
01726       //-add him to a POW assignment/group
01727       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )  ) 
01728       {
01729             SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
01730       }
01731 
01732       ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_POW );
01733       // ATE: Make them neutral!
01734       if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01735       {
01736             pSoldier->bNeutral = TRUE;
01737       }
01738       
01739       RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
01740 
01741       // Is this the first one..?
01742       if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01743       {
01744             //-teleport him to NE Alma sector (not Tixa as originally planned)
01745             pSoldier->sSectorX = 13;
01746             pSoldier->sSectorY = 9;
01747             pSoldier->bSectorZ = 0;
01748 
01749             // put him on the floor!!
01750             pSoldier->bLevel = 0;
01751 
01752             // OK, drop all items!
01753             for ( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
01754             { 
01755                   if( pSoldier->inv[ i ].usItem != 0 )
01756                   {
01757                         WorldItem.fExists = TRUE;
01758                         WorldItem.sGridNo = sAlmaCaptureItemsGridNo[ gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue ];
01759                         WorldItem.ubLevel = 0;
01760                         WorldItem.usFlags = 0;
01761                         WorldItem.bVisible = FALSE;
01762                         WorldItem.bRenderZHeightAboveLevel = 0;
01763 
01764                         memcpy( &(WorldItem.o), &pSoldier->inv[i], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01765 
01766                         AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( 13, 9, 0, sAlmaCaptureItemsGridNo[ gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue ], 1, &WorldItem, FALSE );
01767                         DeleteObj( &( pSoldier->inv[ i ] ) );
01768                   }
01769             }
01770 
01771             pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01772             pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = sAlmaCaptureGridNos[ gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue ];
01773 
01774             gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue++;
01775       }
01776       else if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTDONE )
01777       {
01778             //-teleport him to N7
01779             pSoldier->sSectorX = 7;
01780             pSoldier->sSectorY = 14;
01781             pSoldier->bSectorZ = 0;
01782 
01783             // put him on the floor!!
01784             pSoldier->bLevel = 0;
01785 
01786             // OK, drop all items!
01787             for ( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
01788             { 
01789                   if( pSoldier->inv[ i ].usItem != 0 )
01790                   {
01791                         WorldItem.fExists = TRUE;
01792                         WorldItem.sGridNo = sInterrogationItemGridNo[ gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue ];
01793                         WorldItem.ubLevel = 0;
01794                         WorldItem.usFlags = 0;
01795                         WorldItem.bVisible = FALSE;
01796                         WorldItem.bRenderZHeightAboveLevel = 0;
01797 
01798                         memcpy( &(WorldItem.o), &pSoldier->inv[i], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01799 
01800                         AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( 7, 14, 0, sInterrogationItemGridNo[ gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue ], 1, &WorldItem, FALSE );
01801                         DeleteObj( &( pSoldier->inv[ i ] ) );
01802                   }
01803             }
01804 
01805             pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01806             pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = gsInterrogationGridNo[ gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue ];
01807 
01808             gStrategicStatus.ubNumCapturedForRescue++;
01809       }
01810 
01811       //Bandaging him would prevent him from dying (due to low HP)
01812       pSoldier->bBleeding = 0;
01813 
01814       // wake him up
01815       if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
01816       {
01817             PutMercInAwakeState( pSoldier );
01818             pSoldier->fForcedToStayAwake = FALSE;
01819       }
01820 
01821       //Set his life to 50% + or - 10 HP.
01822       pSoldier->bLife = pSoldier->bLifeMax / 2;
01823       if ( pSoldier->bLife <= 35 )
01824       {
01825             pSoldier->bLife = 35;
01826       }
01827       else if ( pSoldier->bLife >= 45 )
01828       {
01829             pSoldier->bLife += (INT8)(10 - Random( 21 ) );
01830       }
01831 
01832       // make him quite exhausted when found
01833       pSoldier->bBreath = pSoldier->bBreathMax = 50;
01834       pSoldier->sBreathRed = 0;
01835       pSoldier->fMercCollapsedFlag = FALSE;
01836 }

01838 
01839 void HandleEnemyStatusInCurrentMapBeforeLoadingNewMap()
01840 {
01841       INT32 i;
01842       BOOLEAN fMadeCorpse;
01843       INT8 bKilledEnemies = 0, bKilledCreatures = 0, bKilledRebels = 0, bKilledCivilians = 0;
01844       return;
01845       //If any of the soldiers are dying, kill them now.
01846       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01847       {
01848             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife < OKLIFE && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife )
01849             {
01850                   MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife = 0;
01851                   HandleSoldierDeath( MercPtrs[ i ], &fMadeCorpse );
01852                   bKilledEnemies++;
01853             }
01854       }
01855       //Do the same for the creatures.
01856       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01857       {
01858             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife < OKLIFE && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife )
01859             {
01860                   MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife = 0;
01861                   HandleSoldierDeath( MercPtrs[ i ], &fMadeCorpse );
01862                   bKilledCreatures++;
01863             }
01864       }
01865       //Militia
01866       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01867       {
01868             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife < OKLIFE && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife )
01869             {
01870                   MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife = 0;
01871                   HandleSoldierDeath( MercPtrs[ i ], &fMadeCorpse );
01872                   bKilledRebels++;
01873             }
01874       }
01875       //Civilians
01876       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01877       {
01878             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife < OKLIFE && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife )
01879             {
01880                   MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife = 0;
01881                   HandleSoldierDeath( MercPtrs[ i ], &fMadeCorpse );
01882                   bKilledCivilians++;
01883             }
01884       }
01885 
01886 // TEST MESSAGES ONLY!
01887       if( bKilledCivilians )
01888             ScreenMsg( FONT_BLUE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"%d civilians died after you left the sector.", bKilledCivilians );
01889       if( bKilledRebels )
01890             ScreenMsg( FONT_BLUE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"%d militia died after you left the sector.", bKilledRebels );
01891       if( bKilledEnemies )
01892             ScreenMsg( FONT_BLUE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"%d enemies died after you left the sector.", bKilledEnemies );
01893       if( bKilledCreatures )
01894             ScreenMsg( FONT_BLUE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"%d creatures died after you left the sector.", bKilledCreatures );
01895       
01896       if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
01897       {
01898             SECTORINFO *pSector;
01899             pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR(gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY) ];
01900             pSector->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
01901             pSector->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
01902             pSector->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
01903             pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle = 0;
01904             //RecalculateSectorWeight( 
01905       }
01906       else if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01907       {
01908             UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector;
01909             pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01910             if( !pSector )
01911                   return;
01912             pSector->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
01913             pSector->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
01914             pSector->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
01915             pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle = 0;
01916       }
01917 }
01918 
01919 BOOLEAN PlayerSectorDefended( UINT8 ubSectorID )
01920 {
01921       SECTORINFO *pSector;
01922       pSector = &SectorInfo[ ubSectorID ];
01923       if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] +
01924                   pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ] +
01925                   pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] )
01926       { //militia in sector
01927             return TRUE;
01928       }
01929       if( FindMovementGroupInSector( (UINT8)SECTORX( ubSectorID ), (UINT8)SECTORY( ubSectorID ), TRUE ) )
01930       { //player in sector
01931             return TRUE;
01932       }
01933       return FALSE;
01934 }
01935 
01936 //Assumes gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector
01937 BOOLEAN OnlyHostileCivsInSector()
01938 {
01939       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01940       INT32 i;
01941       BOOLEAN fHostileCivs = FALSE;
01942 
01943       //Look for any hostile civs.
01944       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01945       {
01946             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01947             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife )
01948             {
01949                   if( !pSoldier->bNeutral )
01950                   {
01951                         fHostileCivs = TRUE;
01952                         break;
01953                   }
01954             }
01955       }
01956       if( !fHostileCivs )
01957       { //No hostile civs, so return FALSE
01958             return FALSE;
01959       }
01960       //Look for anybody else hostile.  If found, return FALSE immediately.
01961       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01962       {
01963             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01964             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife )
01965             {
01966                   if( !pSoldier->bNeutral )
01967                   {
01968                         return FALSE;
01969                   }
01970             }
01971       }
01972       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01973       {
01974             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01975             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife )
01976             {
01977                   if( !pSoldier->bNeutral )
01978                   {
01979                         return FALSE;
01980                   }
01981             }
01982       }
01983       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01984       {
01985             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01986             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife )
01987             {
01988                   if( !pSoldier->bNeutral )
01989                   {
01990                         return FALSE;
01991                   }
01992             }
01993       }
01994       //We only have hostile civilians, don't allow time compression.
01995       return TRUE;
01996 }
